script.name: Cmd.Anarkis.ADS.Carr.Pickup.Grp
script.description: Auto prep ships: dock array of ships at carrier

line.comment: * Don't do anything if no space to dock any ships
* Filter to ships in array that can dock here
* Remove any ships already docked here, ships not existing, or skipped ships
* If no ships able/required to converge, return
* Select sample target ship to get sector
* Log which ships are to be picked up
* Jump or fly to sector in which our pickup group is atm
* Wait untill all other ships reached dock distance from this carrier

line.text: '%sShip group %s is to be docked at %s.'

line.comment: * Order target ships to dock here while space remains

sval.val: Auto prep ships: dock array of ships at carrier
%sShip group %s is to be docked at %s.
Don't do anything if no space to dock any ships
Filter to ships in array that can dock here
Remove any ships already docked here, ships not existing, or skipped ships
If no ships able/required to converge, return
Select sample target ship to get sector
Log which ships are to be picked up
Jump or fly to sector in which our pickup group is atm
Wait untill all other ships reached dock distance from this carrier
Order target ships to dock here while space remains
